value:
$WmMPID_マーニャ,ch06_26_Magna_F_Normal,Face|I am one of the Four Heavenly
Knights of Silesse. I will fight
honorably.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Good work. In the meantime, I have
finished my research. As you know,
Fáfnir's is no ordinary strength.$k$pThe source of that strength is the
Crown of the Dvergar he bears.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is the Crown of the Dvergar?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|A crown passed down by the royal
family of Niðavellir. It grants the
strength to protect the realm.$k$pBut even in light of its long history,
the strength it has granted Fáfnir
is unprecedented.$k$pHowever, there is a treasure of
similar might kept by the royal
family: the sword Gramr.$k$pWith it, it might be possible to match
Fáfnir's power. But, well...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|But...what?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Gramr is a powerful blade. But it is
said that its true strength can only
be drawn out by one of royal blood.$k$pWith the coup d'état, the royal line
was ended. Even so, it may still be
our best gamble.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Eitri. If that's the case,
then let's go get this magical sword!
We'll definitely need Gramr!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Er... Wouldn't a treasure of Niðavellir
be in the royal palace of Niðavellir?
That is, won't Fáfnir be guarding it?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|No. Gramr isn't kept at the castle.
It was given to our neighboring
country, Jötunheimr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! Such an important sword was
handed over to another country?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|The Niðavellir army uses seiðjárn
weapons, so we have no use for
things like swords anymore.$k$pYears ago, our relationship with
Jötunheimr had devolved to such
a degree it almost led to war.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Ótr had the idea to offer them
a treasure in the name of peace,
and Gramr was the perfect choice!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I see... Such a course almost seems
unthinkable now, and from Ótr too,
no less...$k$pThat is good news for us though.
Much better than trying to steal
the sword from Fáfnir himself.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|I leave the negotiations with
Jötunheimr to you.$k$pIf you do manage to claim the blade,
bring it back to me, and I will do
what I can to help you further.$k$p$EFace_Smile|The power of that royal treasure
may prove useful in my research
going forward.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool|It sure is nice to have the foremost
expert in seiðjárn on our side! You
can count on us!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|All right, let's make haste
to Jötunheimr.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Yes! We'll be back with Gramr in
no time, Eitri! Just watch!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Now, off to Jötunheimr!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Reginn, wait. There is something
I would like to ask you before you
leave... Have we not met before?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|I've seen you around the castle!
But this is the first time I've spoken
to you directly that I recall.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|I see... Sorry to ask such a strange
question as you're about to leave.
You're free to go. But be careful.$k$p$Sbs150|
